Package com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.dialogcomponents.swing

This package contains Swing components for the new PDB Connector nodes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Changeable
    An interface to show that a change listener can be registered to the object
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChangeableDoubleSpinner
    A JSpinner implementation which also implements Changeable and stores a double value
    ChangeableIntSpinner
    A JSpinner implementation which also implements Changeable and stores a int value
    CountClearButtonBox
    A box to add 'Count' and 'Clear' buttons to a QueryPanel The buttons are laid out horizontally (the default) or vertically, with a 5 pixel spacer around and between them.
    DateInputPanel
    A simple compound spinner panel to allow date input.
    JScrollPopupMenu
    A scrollable popup menu.
    JSuggestingTextField
    A text field with a Suggester which shows a dropdown once typing has started if there are any matching suggestions.
    NestedDropdownTextField
    A JTextField with a hierarchical popup menu (2 levels) of categories and possible values (which can be in a category sub-menu or the top level menu).
    NestedDropdownTextField.Builder
    A Builder class to create a NestedDropdownTextField.
    NestedDropdownTextField.MenuAction
    A convenience class to encapsulate a menu item representing an allowed value with a different action command to displayed text (which for example allows two categories to have an option with the same display name but different actions)
    SwingUtils
    Utility class for performing operations on Swing components and DialogComponents

Package com.vernalis.pdbconnector2.dialogcomponents.swing Description

This package contains Swing components for the new PDB Connector nodes
